website_summaries.verdict: The HP Spectre x360 13 is a great little laptop, but if battery life matters to you a lot, opt for the HD display, not the more expensive 4K.
pros: Beautifully designed and less than 3 pounds (1.4 kg), the HP Spectre x360 13 has a great keyboard and trackpad, a sharp 4K display and an above-average sound system
Battery life is decent for such a power-sucking screen, and performance fits right in line with its class
cons: Battery life takes a hit with the 4K display compared to high definition
The system runs a little hot
